title: French Riviera Beachfront Indulgence in Nice with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Bask in the sun-drenched charm of the French Riviera from Hôtel West End Nice, a Belle Époque masterpiece nestled along Nice's glitzy Promenade des Anglais. Just steps from the azure waters of the Mediterranean, this glamorous retreat places you within easy reach of the city's pebbled beaches and the colourful Old Town.

Sample Mediterranean flavours at Le Siècle Restaurant, showcasing Parisian-inspired decor paired with red velvet, brass and wood details, or unwind with a drink in the unique Horse Guard Bar, nestled in the hotel's old chapel. Open seasonally, Lounge Palmeraie is your go-to for sunny afternoons, delectable cocktails and live music on select days.

For a change of pace, stroll through the charming streets of Vieux Nice, filled with bustling markets, artisan boutiques and traditional French bistros. On Mondays, the square transforms into an antique market, inviting you to uncover vintage treasures and unique souvenirs.

title: Stylish Nice Mediterranean City Break Just Minutes From Pebble Beachfront
description: Discover magic on the Mediterranean with an escape to Holiday Inn Nice, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned in the historic city’s heart - and just seven minutes from Promenade des Anglais, it's iconic pebbled beachfront. Spend days lazing in sun-kissed splendour or uncovering the city’s exhilarating blend of French and Italian culture, returning for laidback dishes at trattoria Miamici or savour aperitifs on the hotel’s palm-fringed terrace.
location_description: Holiday Inn Nice, an IHG Hotel

vendor_name: Chateau Saint-Martin & Spa - an Oetker Collection Hotel
title: Southern France Hillside Chateau Suites & Villas with Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Award-Winning Spa
description:
Step into Provençal paradise at Chateau Saint Martin & Spa, and unwind with award-winning treatments at Spa Saint-Martin by La Prairie in garden cabanas adorned with flowers. Head to Le Saint-Martin for an evening of Michelin-starred dining on a panoramic terrace, or discover L'Oliveraie for fresh Mediterranean flavours in a shady olive grove setting.

Perched atop a hill, the property overlooks the sparkling French Riviera for sweeping views of the Mediterranean. Just a short drive away guests can explore the medieval city of Saint-Paul-de-Vence, the iconic seaside town of Nice, the perfume capital of Grasse and the stunning Verdon Gorge - one of France's most breathtaking natural wonders.

title: Sophisticated French-Chic Stay near Nice International Airport
description: The glittering cobalt seas and pebbled beaches of Nice are a stone's throw away when you stay at Crowne Plaza Nice - Grand Arenas, an IHG Hotel, a modern escape conveniently located by the city's international airport. When you're not dining on Niçois gourmet delights or losing yourself in the art museums, indulge in a bistro meal or evening cocktail at BALM restaurant and bar. Or, head to the top floor, where the well-equipped fitness centre and sauna will keep you both active and relaxed.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Nice - Grand Arenas, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Rue Costes et Bellonte, 06200 Nice, France
